column26: Illumina HiSeq 2000 paired end sequencing; RNA-seq analysis to investigate the downstream genes of EXB1 in Arabidopsis
column27: RNA-seq analysis to investigate the downstream genes of EXB1 in Arabidopsis
column28: Illumina HiSeq 2000 paired end sequencing; RNA-seq analysis to investigate the downstream genes of EXB1 in Arabidopsis
column29: Protocols: The 14-day homozygous 4EnhpEXB1-EXB1GR-13 transgenetic plants were treated with 30 IzM DEX or DMSO (mock). The tissues around leaf axils were collected. Total RNAs were prepared using TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen). The library was constructed by the Biodynamic Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC) of Peking University following their standard procedure.
